author: jsign
content:
Sharing performance profile of Ethrex and Reth on 500 mainnet blocks, using a Zisk internal tool in ziskemu that provides cost using “AIR cells” which is a much better proxy for performance cost than zkVM cycles which are a red herring when zkVM precompiles are involved.
https://hackmd.io/@jsign/eth-zisk-air-cost-reth-ethrex
